attributes.action: Stop the proposal for mineral extraction and landfill at Hockham Woods Norfolk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Minerals and Waste local plans have identified an area of woodland between the villages of Hockham and Wretham in Norfolk, for potential extraction and landfill. The area is within a Special Protection Area and should not have even been allowed to be proposed by the Forestry Commission

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Stop the proposal for mineral extraction and landfill at Hockham Woods Norfolk."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15504.asp

Prime Minister's Office
